title: highlights
notes:
- we can use **bold** and *italics* to highlight texts.
	
	- we can also use `-` to indicate hierarchy
		
		- and the third hierarichy

title: code blocks
notes:
```python
import pandas as pd
import numpy as np

df = pd.DataFrame()
```

title: math
notes:
The sum of $a_i, i = 0, \dots, 10$ can be denoted as 
$$
\sum_{i=0}^{10} a_i
$$
cues: use `$`  and `$$` to start editing math equations.

title: blockquotes
notes:
> this is a block quote
>> this is a nested block quote
>>> and another one
>>> - this is an item of a block quote
>>> 	- this is another item of the same block quote
cues: use `>` to start writing block quotes.
